org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.validate
Interface IAeResourceValidationErrorHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AePddValidator.AePddErrorHandler, AeResourceValidationErrorHandler
public interface IAeResourceValidationErrorHandler

This interface defines methods that will be called by a validator when it is validating a resource (PDD, PDEF, etc...) file/document.

Method Summary
 void contentError(java.lang.String aMessage, org.w3c.dom.Node aNode)
          Called when the validator discovers an error when performing "additional validation".
 void contentWarning(java.lang.String aMessage, org.w3c.dom.Node aNode)
          Called when the validator discovers a warning when performing "additional validation".
 void fatalError(java.lang.String aMessage)
          Called when the validator finds a fatal error and cannot continue.
 void parseError(java.lang.String aMessage, int aLineNumber)
          Called when an error is found while parsing the resource.
 void parseFatalError(java.lang.String aMessage, int aLineNumber)
          Called when a fatal error is found while parsing the resource.
 void parseWarning(java.lang.String aMessage, int aLineNumber)
          Called when a warning is found while parsing the resource.

contentError

public void contentError(java.lang.String aMessage,
                         org.w3c.dom.Node aNode)
Called when the validator discovers an error when performing "additional validation". This additional validation tries to find problems that cannot be caught by the resource's schema.

Parameters:
aMessage -
aNode -

                           org.w3c.dom.Node aNode)
